original_text: In the morning therefore you shall be brought near by your tribes. And the tribe that the Lord takes by lot shall come near by clans. And the clan that the Lord takes shall come near by households. And the household that the Lord takes shall come near man by man.
korean_text: 너희는 아침에 너희의 지파대로 가까이 나아오라 여호와께 뽑히는 그 지파는 그 족속대로 가까이 나아올 것이요 여호와께 뽑히는 족속은 그 가족대로 가까이 나아올 것이요 여호와께 뽑히는 그 가족은 그 남자들이 가까이 나아올 것이며

sentences.original_text: In the morning therefore you shall be brought near by your tribes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 아침에는 너희가 너희 지파대로 가까이 나아올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: And the tribe that the Lord takes by lot
And the clan that the Lord takes
And the household that the Lord takes
shall come near man by man.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람 한 사람씩 가까이 나아올 것이다.
